import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Navbar() { const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { const token = localStorage.getItem('token') if( token ) setIsLogin(true) else setIsLogin(false) }, []) return (
JsonWebToken
  • { !isLogin ? :
    • Sign Out
    }
) } export default Navbar
